name: Killer of Dead
description:
The Meredosia Hotel hasn't had a tenant in months, due to its reputation for being haunted. It's your job to defend your haunt and take-out all the big spooks to keep the managers from calling the authorities. In this low-bit, side-scrolling rpg, you must choose your battles wisely and collect power-ups to achieve your mission.

Use the arrow keys to move.
Z is confirm/use door/attack
X is zap/hard attack.
C is cure.
